name: 3dROIMaker
author: AFNI Developers
description: Create a labelled set of ROIs from input data, useful in combining functional and tractographic/structural data.

inputs.description: 3D volume(s) of values, especially functionally-derived quantities like correlation values or ICA Z-scores.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Threshold for values in INSET, used to create ROI islands from the 3D volume's sea of values.
inputs.name: Threshold value

inputs.description: Prefix of output name, with output files being: PREFIX_GM* and PREFIX_GMI*
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: 3D (or multi-subbrick) volume containing integer values with which to label specific GM ROIs after thresholding.
inputs.name: Reference dataset

inputs.description: Minimum size a cluster of voxels must have in order to remain a GM ROI after thresholding. Can reduce 'noisy' clusters.
inputs.name: Volume threshold

inputs.description: Restrict each found region to keep only N voxels with the highest inset values.
inputs.name: Keep top N voxels

inputs.description: Select N max contiguous voxels in a region starting from peak voxel and expanding.
inputs.name: Keep top N contiguous voxels

inputs.description: Number of voxels to pad each found ROI in order to turn GM ROIs into inflated (GMI) ROIs.
inputs.name: Inflation size

inputs.description: Trim the INSET to exclude voxels in WM by excluding those which overlap an input WM skeleton.
inputs.name: Trim off WM

inputs.description: 3D volume containing info of WM, as might be defined from an FA map or anatomical segmentation.
inputs.name: WM skeleton

inputs.description: Threshold value for WM skeleton if it is not a mask.
inputs.name: Skeleton threshold

inputs.description: Stop inflation at locations which are already on WM skeleton.
inputs.name: Stop at WM skeleton

inputs.description: Do not allow any inflation into the skel-region.
inputs.name: Strictly stop at WM skeleton

inputs.description: 3D volume containing info of CSF. Info must be a binary mask already.
inputs.name: CSF skeleton

inputs.description: Mask within which to apply threshold. Useful if the MINTHR is a negative value.
inputs.name: Input mask

inputs.description: Define neighbors loosely so that voxels can be grouped into the same ROI if they share at least one vertex.
inputs.name: Vertex neighbor grouping

inputs.description: Switch to output *.nii.gz GM and GMI files
inputs.name: Output NIFTI files

inputs.description: Start with a WM ROI, inflate it to find the nearest GM, then expand that GM and subtract away the WM+CSF parts.
inputs.name: Pre-inflation inset

inputs.description: Number of voxels for initial inflation of PSET.
inputs.name: Pre-inflation size

inputs.description: Switch for turning off labeltable attachment to the output GM and GMI files.
inputs.name: Disable labeltable

output-files.description: GM map of ROIs based on value- and volume-thresholding, corresponding to gray matter regions of activation.
output-files.name: GM map of ROIs

output-files.description: Map of inflated GM ROIs based on GM map, with ROIs inflated either by user-design or WM skeleton.
output-files.name: GMI map of inflated ROIs
